    Subinterfaces of Movable in com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    Newtonian
    A Newtonian is a special case of a Movable that abides the basic laws of gravity and friction.
    interface 
    SceneBorderCrossingWatcher
    Implement this interface to be notified if the YaegerEntity crosses the boundary of the YaegerScene.
    interface 
    SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
    Implement this interface to be notified if the YaegerEntity touches the boundary of the YaegerScene.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DynamicCompositeEntity
    When a group of Entities are combined to create a single Entity, they are a composition and this class should be used to perform that composition.
